text: @JoeBiden You sir are the enemy of the people that will be defeated. But telling you that is a waste of time as you forgot the first part of the sentence before the second half was complete. #Trump2020 is coming. #coronavirus has exposed the true colors of the #ChineseOwnedDemocrats.
